name: Waffle Omelette Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: egg, salt, pepper, nonstick cooking spray
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, add the beaten eggs, any of your favorite toppings, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Grease a waffle iron with nonstick spray.  Add the egg mixture and cook according to machine instruction to until the eggs are fully set and slightly browned, 2 minutes.
Remove the egg from the waffle iron and serve.
